dataList.dlg: If it gets in my way... not even shadows are safe from my blade.
I'm sharpening my sword. Nothing more meaningful to start the day with.
I'm cleaning my sword. Nothing more appropriate to pass the noon with.
I'm polishing my sword. Nothing more worthy to end the day with.
I like to act alone. Others only hinder me. Oh, there is one exception.
It's best not to speak needless words. Some might take it as an invitation to fight.
Rodya is the only one I can get along with. She's someone I can cross swords with, you get it?
Too many people are on this bus. A quarter of what we have now should suffice. What do you think?
If it's to pursue a higher caliber of art... I'm willing to take this favor.
Hey, did you seriously vanish without a word? Some bold clock you are.
I'll show you the ultimate swordmanship.
My sword's ready.
Wanna see what I can express with a sharp sword?
You're not asking for a fight, are you?
Just don't get in the way.
Was the edge dull?
Tch!
It was sharpened pretty nicely.
One less source of noise for a while.
Came to an agreement.
It was too bothersome.
Behold, idiots. This is how you use a sword.
I believe I've seen a satisfying amount of blood.
I'd have dealt with this in seconds if I did it myself.
